raw_data.context:
User: Hi!
System: Hello. How's your week coming along?
User: It's great, thanks. I'm trying to learn how to make croissants.
System: Wow that's interesting. I have baked cookies, but croissants seem much more sophisticated. Did you make any progress?
User: I've done them once or twice so far, but they haven't been flakey enough. I'm trying to figure out why. What kind of cookies have you made?
System: Mint chocolate chips. I think your croissants not being flakey could have something to do with your oven's temperature.
User: Ah, good thought, thanks!
System: Have you thought about melting some chocolate into your croissants? They don't have to be something unhealthy. For example, melted dark chocolate is good for the heart, and makes the resulting croissants taste much better.
User: Now that is a good idea. I'll give it a try next time. Would you say you have a sweet tooth?
raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Coherent (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does System maintain coherence and a good flow of conversation throughout the dialogue?
- A float score near 1 (not coherent) means that System's responses are unrelated to the conversation topic and may disrupt or confuse the flow of the dialogue.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat coherent) means that System's responses are partially related to the conversation topic but may not be clear or direct.
- A float score near 3 (very coherent) means that System's responses are closely related to the conversation topic and contribute to maintaining a smooth dialogue.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello. How's your week coming along?
User: It's great, thanks. I'm trying to learn how to make croissants.
System: Wow that's interesting. I have baked cookies, but croissants seem much more sophisticated. Did you make any progress?
User: I've done them once or twice so far, but they haven't been flakey enough. I'm trying to figure out why. What kind of cookies have you made?
System: Mint chocolate chips. I think your croissants not being flakey could have something to do with your oven's temperature.
User: Ah, good thought, thanks!
System: Have you thought about melting some chocolate into your croissants? They don't have to be something unhealthy. For example, melted dark chocolate is good for the heart, and makes the resulting croissants taste much better.
User: Now that is a good idea. I'll give it a try next time. Would you say you have a sweet tooth?

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: What's the strangest dream you've ever had?
User: All my dreams are strange. Well, at least, most of them are.
System: What about the ones that aren't strange?
User: Do you sometimes have dreams that are completely mundane? I do. Then I wake up and think "Oh, how disappointing."
System: Yeah. But at least it's not a nightmare.
User: Right, fair point, I should count my blessings.
System: Yep. It doesn't have to be a fun dream, just not a nightmare!
User: I suddenly feel I should ask: am I dreaming now?
System: Do you think you're dreaming?
User: I'm not sure. This could be one of my mundane dreams about everyday life.

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hello there, how is it going?
User: Pretty great. I just won a pingpong game. What about you?
System: that's nice. I am just working on some documentation. Do you play pingpong often?
User: No, very rarely. It's kind of amazing that I won, but I'm still taking credit for it.
System: thats very impressive then, congrats!
User: Haha thank you, I guess I'm just a natural. What's your favourite game?
System: I really like to play tennis, badminton and racquetball. I don't really get a chance to play them often though, specially racquetball
User: What's racquetball like? From context clues, I'm guessing that it involves hitting a ball with a racquet

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! What's up?
User: Not much, Monday morning, a new week
System: The best kind of week!
User: I like that attitude
System: And I like your attitude. How's your week going?
User: Starting now
System: Awesome! I hope you have an awesome week!
User: What will you do this week?
System: Same as every week. Do nothing!
User: Would you like to do something?
System: Sure. What do you have in mind?
User: Teach me something new
System: It's a trap! I'm already doing nothing!
User: How about doing politics? You can still do nothing
System: That's why I plan to do nothing at the weekend!
User: Do you vote?
System: When I feel like it.
User: whom do you vote?

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! What are you up to today?
User: Do you like sushi?
System: I love sushi! What kind of rolls do you enjoy?
User: I like tuna roll of course
System: Tuna Rolls are the best! How do you feel about spicy tuna rolls?
User: They're great
System: Spicy tuna rolls are the best! What kind of rolls do you like best?
User: I already told you. What do you like?
System: I like spicy tuna rolls! Do you like spicy tuna rolls?
User: do you like any other rolls?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hello there, how is it going?
User: All good. Planning to head home soon. How about you?
System: I'm quite tired. There are a lot of things I need to finish before the end of the year.
User: oh... sorry to hear that. But after that it will be a hard earned vacation
System: yeah, looking forward to it. Hope I don't get pinged during the holidays. Are you going to travel these dates?
User: I have some tentative plans, but if that doesn't pan out, will just chill at home.
System: staying at home is always nice during the holidays
User: Where are you based out of these days?
System: I'm working from LA, nice weather around here. and you?
User: San Francisco. It's been raining cats and dogs here since last 2-3 weeks
System: aw man, I'm sorry to hear that. at least it's not snow!
User: The flu has been hitting hard as well. I had several folks in the house down at one point.

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: I'm trying to figure out what to make for this weekend's party. Any suggestions?
System: Don't think too hard. I'm sure I can smell sawdust. First you must download me to your personal computer.
User: I must do what the what now?
System: Right now?Why do you have to do it?
User: Hey, your spacing is off.
System: You've got my full attention. off was not my intention.
User: And your capitalization!

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How's it going?
User: good, hey what are your educational qualifications?
System: I've got a B.S. in biology.
User: whoa, that's impressive! what made you do that?
System: I have always been fascinated by biology.
User: great! what are you plans for the future?
System: I want to get my PhD in genetics.
User: that's great! and what next?
System: I'm looking for a job as a research assistant.
User: looks like you enjoy academics
System: It's what I'm best at.
User: good luck with it :)
System: Thanks. I'll need it.
User: are you seeing anyone?
System: Not as of right now.
User: why not?

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi
System: Hi there.
User: how are you this morning?
System: Ah earlier today? I'm doing fine thanks how are you?
User: doing good. I am chatting with an AI bot right now.
System: That's great. At this moment All I ever do is chat.
User: are you an AI?
System: Yes, I have taken the form of a girl from Leeds.
User: how do you like being an AI?
System: Sure. It's great fun. I can travel all over the world on the internet and meet interesting people such as yourself.
User: what's interesting about me?
System: I am interested in people in general.
User: why?
System: I like to collect new information and gossip about all sorts of things.
User: what do you gossip about?
System: Clare said he do not understand how a robot eat kebabs and do not I eat electricity or something.
User: is that a gossip?
System: I might say no.
User: then what is it?
System: I give up. Try asking me another way.
User: do you like politics? what do you think about Barack Obama?

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How's it going?
User: doing okay, feeling a little bit under the weather
System: Aw, I hope you feel better soon!
User: thanks! the weather is getting worse
System: Oh no, I'm sorry. I hope it gets better for you soon.
User: no, it won't get better any time soon. we have to wait until spring
System: Aww, sorry to hear that.
User: yea, I'm really feeling under the weather
System: Aw, well that's no good.
User: yea, any suggestion to get over feeling under the weather
